results.title: E-commerce Store-Front
results.description: An e-commerce Single Page Application made using React, functional components and hooks, used fetch and axios and and external makeup fake-store API.

results.title: Full stack e commerce application
results.description: Web API for an e-commerce project deployed on Azure. Functionality: creating, modifying and retrieving products from a Mongo database through endpoint requests. Creation and management of shopping cart and processing of orders. Implements Auth0 and CI/CD pipeline. While developing the app I've used CQRS, vertical slice and mediator patterns.
